title: Toixc, Toxic and i want to cry
body: What the actual hell did i do wrong to get called a c***, usless and a waste of human space. Played supp naut first time have first blood but won lane and i got called useless cause i didnt engage cause i dont know how to. got called a C*** cause i could save someone in time and called uselss even tho i helped my mid laner 1v3. Wut THE ACTUAL HELL.At the point i dont even want to beleive about how the "reporting system" works cause im so insignificant that riot doenst even give a shit now do they huh? im sick and tired of this. champ select mid gets taken from me so i said fine ill supp i even gave them a warning on my support abilities that iom not that good and i get flammed the whole game rly riot? are u trying to drive new players away? wut is this. i have to face with 2 toxic players because they didnt like the way i play? wut happen to teamwork? wut happen to players helping the otehr ones that are in need? so by ur rule is u need 3 epople to report the toxic players in game. that deosn seem like a rule anyone is willlling to do. its like if ur dad was an abusive father and he happened to be a cop then who are u suppose to tell on him on anotehr cop? u think they will believe it? im so pissed off and ticked off by this people. OCE where the players are worst than NA in toxicity. and its f****** NA!

replies.body:
So you come to say this and then 2 hours later post a thread about how someone flamed you after you did the same thing to them.

Anyways, a single report is all that is needed for a player to be on the behaviour system radar. If they are constantly like this, then yes. Eventually they will get punished. 

Punishment works in four tiers:

* 10 game chat restrict
* 25 game chat restrict
* 14 day suspension
* permaban

In game:

*  you can mute the players and you wont have to see their flame. 
* You can make a big friends list and constantly play 5 man premade (you get ip bonuses and more mastery points).
* Just ignore them
